author: Special Correspondent
text:
Around 100 Tamil Nadu Commando Force personnel would be deployed on the festival day near the tank.

20,000 strong police force is to be deployed on February 22 and its eve when a mammoth turn out of pilgrims is expected.

Kumbakonam has been brought under thick security blanket with teams of police personnel from across the state.

A comprehensive security plan has been drafted exclusively for the festival.

Surveillance has been enhanced aided by a chain of around 100 cameras deployed near the temple tank, entry and exit points of the town and at other vantage points.

A special control room has been established close to the temple tank with police deployed round-the-clock.

The control room is equipped with a string of monitors connected to the surveillance cameras to monitor the “live” movements taking place at the tank and its vicinity.

The security arrangements include Bomb Detection and Disposal Squads, Quick Reaction Teams and Traffic teams. Around 100 Tamil Nadu Commando Force personnel would be deployed on the festival day near the tank.
title: 20,000 police to be deployed
